title: In The Navy
lyrics:
[intro, kazoo] | (Gm)  (Gm) | (Gm)  (Gm) | (Cm)  (Bb) | (Eb) (D7) |
 
(Gm)Where can you find pleasure, search the world for treasure
(Gm)Learn science, technology?
(Cm)Where can you begin to (Bb)make your dreams all come true
(Eb)On the land or on the (D7)sea?
 
(Gm)Where can you learn to fly, play in sports or skindive
(Gm)Study oceanography?
(Cm)Sign up for the big band (Bb)or sit in the grand stand
(Eb)When your team and others (D7)meet
 
[chorus]
In the (G)Navy, yes, you can sail the seven seas
In the (Am)Navy, yes, you can put your mind at ease
In the (Am)Navy, come on now people, make a stand
In the (G)Navy, can't you see we need a (D7)hand
In the (G)Navy, come on, protect the motherland
In the (Am)Navy, come on and join your fellow, man
In the (Am)Navy, come on, people, and make a stand
In the (G)Navy (in the Navy), in the Navy
 
[clapping] They want you! They want you! They want you as a new recruit!
 
(Gm)If you like adventure don't you wait to enter
(Gm)The recruiting office fast
(Cm)Don't you hesitate, there (Bb)is no need to wait
They're (Eb)signing up new seamen (D7)fast
 
(Gm)Maybe you are too young to join up today
But (Gm)don't you worry 'bout the thing
(Cm)For I'm sure there will be (Bb)always the good Navy
(Eb)Protecting the land and (D7)sea
 
[chorus]
In the (G)Navy, yes, you can sail the seven seas
In the (Am)Navy, yes, you can put your mind at ease
In the (Am)Navy, come on now people, make a stand
In the (G)Navy, can't you see we need a (D7)hand
In the (G)Navy, come on, protect the motherland
In the (Am)Navy, come on and join your fellow, man
In the (Am)Navy, come on, people, and make a stand
In the (G)Navy (in the Navy), in the Navy (in the Navy)
 
[clapping] They want you! They want you! They want you as a new recruit!  x2 [end]
